name: A Spell of Spelling Quiz | Spelling & Punctuation | 15 Questions

questions.text:
Easy television commercial slogans for all you couch potatos.

Type the misspelled word correctly.
questions.explanation:
potatoes.

	I hope Dan Quayle isn't taking this quiz....

questions.text:
If you haven't been involved in the arts this quiz is probally too hard for you.

Type the misspelled word correctly.
questions.explanation:
probably.

	If you can't spell well, then quizmaking is "probally to hard for you" too.

questions.text:
What does cigerette smoke contain that makes it more of a carcinogen than marijuana smoke?

Type the misspelled word correctly.
questions.explanation:
cigarette.

	Maybe this person had too many funny cigarettes?

questions.text:
The date is Augest 16th. Who is Undertakers most recent enemy?

Type the misspelled word correctly.
questions.explanation:
August.

	Ah, wrestling...the haven of intellectual discourse (just kidding, WWE fans).

questions.text:
The spelling is corret, so do not bug me that I should have more answers.

Type the misspelled word correctly.
questions.explanation:
correct.

	This is also not an example of the kind of interesting info that we like to see on quizzes!

questions.text:
Which International Organization was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1954 and 1981 for its efforts in providing protection and material assistance to war victims and displaced non-military persons on a purly social, humanitarian and non-political basis?

Type the misspelled word correctly.
questions.explanation:
purely.

	Now that is someone who can spell!

questions.text:
True or False: is grafitti an art?

Type the misspelled word correctly.
questions.explanation:
graffiti.

	Spelling is, however, definitely an art.

questions.text:
What was Natalie Portman's first proffesional play?

Type the misspelled word correctly.
questions.explanation:
professional.

	Professional grammar help is also in order.

questions.text:
This sacred text of Hinduism included a collection of rituals and mythological and philosophical commantaries. 

Type the misspelled word correctly.
How much do you know about Britney Spears? If you get all ten quesations right I will send you $100.
What did Annie place in the Little Miss Firecraker Pageant?
questions.explanation:
firecracker.

	Must have been an interesting pageant!

questions.text: Renne Is Jon's Ex-Wife She Sued Him Augest 9 For Frued
questions.correct: August fraud & fraud August & August, fraud & fraud, August
questions.explanation:
August fraud & fraud August & August, fraud & fraud, August.

	Looks like we have several people who have trouble with 'August.'

questions.text: On August 6, 1945, there was an atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshimo, Japan. Three days later, another one was dropped on where?
questions.explanation:
Hiroshima.

	But this guy can spell August!

questions.text: Colleen made a shirt with a picture of a duck on it and at tribal counsil asked to be reffered to as sitting duck.
questions.correct: council referred & council, referred & referred council & referred, council
questions.explanation:
council referred & council, referred & referred council & referred, council.

	This one didn't "survive" the editing process!

psychic.

	By the way, if you have trouble spelling but want to write quizzes, please give www.iespell a try. It's invaluable.
